text: Esi menya be Kristo ŋutɔ ƒe lɔlɔ̃nu wònye be nu sia nadzɔ ɖe dzinye ta la, mekpɔa dzidzɔ be “ŋu” sia le nye ŋutilã me. Mekpɔa dzidzɔ hã be amewo dzuam, tia nye agbe yome, eye meɖoa xaxa kple hiã geɖe me, elabena mekpɔa ŋusẽ to gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔ me, eye zi ale si megbɔdzɔ la, zi nenema ke mesẽa ŋue.
